name: claimsight
description: Cross-platform GraphQL learning application with Hasura, Apollo, and PromptQL

scripts.phase2:dev: npx concurrently -n "action,subgraph,gateway,client" -c "blue,yellow,magenta,green" "npm run action:dev" "npm run subgraph:dev" "npm run gateway:dev" "npm run client:dev"
scripts.phase3:dev: npx concurrently -n "action,subgraph,gateway,appointments,client" -c "blue,yellow,magenta,cyan,green" "npm run action:dev" "npm run subgraph:dev" "npm run gateway:dev" "npm run appointments:dev" "npm run client:dev"
scripts.phase4:dev: npx concurrently -n "action,subgraph,gateway,appointments,client" -c "blue,yellow,magenta,cyan,green" "npm run action:dev" "npm run subgraph:dev" "npm run gateway:dev" "npm run appointments:dev" "npm run client:dev"
scripts.phase5:dev: npx concurrently -n "action,subgraph,gateway,appointments,medications,client" -c "blue,yellow,magenta,cyan,red,green" "npm run action:dev" "npm run subgraph:dev" "npm run gateway:dev" "npm run appointments:dev" "npm run medications:dev" "npm run client:dev"
scripts.phase6:dev: npx concurrently -n "action,subgraph,gateway,appointments,medications,client" -c "blue,yellow,magenta,cyan,red,green" "npm run action:dev" "npm run subgraph:dev" "npm run gateway:dev" "npm run appointments:dev" "npm run medications:dev" "npm run client:dev"
scripts.federated:dev: npx concurrently -n "action,subgraph,gateway,appointments,client" -c "blue,yellow,magenta,cyan,green" "npm run action:dev" "npm run subgraph:dev" "npm run gateway:dev" "npm run appointments:dev" "npm run client:dev"
scripts.all:dev: npx concurrently -n "action,client,subgraph" -c "blue,green,yellow" "npm run action:dev" "npm run client:dev" "npm run subgraph:dev"
